result.eng: Excuse me, are you from the stone age?
result.ga: Gabh mo leithscéal an ón chlochaois thú
result.orig: Gabh mo leithscéal an ón chlochaois thú
result.html: Gabh mo leithscéal an ón chlochaois thúExcuse me, are you from the stone age?
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ mo leiṫscéal an ón ċloċaois ṫúExcuse me, are you from the stone age?

result.eng: The child's age, please?
result.ga: Aois an pháiste le do thoil
result.orig: Aois an pháiste le do thoil
result.html: Aois an pháiste le do thoilThe child's age, please?
result.ponchtml: Aois an ṗáiste le do ṫoilThe child's age, please?

result.eng: Children of school-leaving age.
result.ga: Páistí atá in aois fágála scoile
result.orig: Páistí atá in aois fágála scoile
result.html: Páistí atá in aois fágála scoileChildren of school-leaving age.
result.ponchtml: Páistí atá in aois fágála scoileChildren of school-leaving age.

result.eng: Two men twenty years of age were taken to prison.
result.ga: Cuireadh beirt fhear fiche bliain d'aois i bpríosún
result.orig: Cuireadh beirt fhear fiche bliain d'aois i bpríosún
result.html: Cuireadh beirt fhear fiche bliain d'aois i bpríosúnTwo men twenty years of age were taken to prison.
result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ beirt ḟear fiċe bliain d'aois i bpríosúnTwo men twenty years of age were taken to prison.

result.eng: What age are you?
result.ga: Cén aois tú
result.orig: Cén aois tú
result.html: Cén aois túWhat age are you?
result.ponchtml: Cén aois túWhat age are you?

result.eng: He enlisted in the army when he was 18 years of age.
result.ga: Liostáil sé san arm nuair a bhí sé 18 bliain d'aois
result.orig: Liostáil sé san arm nuair a bhí sé 18 bliain d'aois
result.html: Liostáil sé san arm nuair a bhí sé 18 bliain d'aoisHe enlisted in the army when he was 18 years of age.
result.ponchtml: Liostáil sé san arm nuair a ḃí sé 18 bliain d'aoisHe enlisted in the army when he was 18 years of age.

result.eng: He was made king when he reached 18 years of age.
result.ga: Rinneadh rí de nuair a shroich sé 18 mbliana d'aois
result.orig: Rinneadh rí de nuair a shroich sé 18 mbliana d'aois
result.html: Rinneadh rí de nuair a shroich sé 18 mbliana d'aoisHe was made king when he reached 18 years of age.
result.ponchtml: Rinneaḋ rí de nuair a ẛroiċ sé 18 mbliana d'aoisHe was made king when he reached 18 years of age.

result.eng: She started going to school when she was seven years of age.
result.ga: Thosaigh sí ag dul ar scoil nuair a bhí sí seacht mbliana d'aois
result.orig: Thosaigh sí ag dul ar scoil nuair a bhí sí seacht mbliana d'aois
result.html: Thosaigh sí ag dul ar scoil nuair a bhí sí seacht mbliana d'aoisShe started going to school when she was seven years of age.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ sí ag dul ar scoil nuair a ḃí sí seaċt mbliana d'aoisShe started going to school when she was seven years of age.

result.eng: I am twenty years of age.
result.ga: Tá mé fiche bliain d'aois

result.html: Tá mé fiche bliain d'aoisI am twenty years of age.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé fiċe bliain d'aoisI am twenty years of age.

result.eng: When he was 11 years of age, the whole family moved to France.
result.ga: Nuair a bhí sé 11 bliain d'aois bhog an teaghlach go léir go dtí an Fhrainc

result.eng: A few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.
result.ga: Traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáide

result.eng: Jamie was at the end of his seventh year of age.

result.eng: But him playing with little boats, at his age!
